annotations.description: We have been watching a lacklustre game with only a few moments to excite the crowd. The players surely have better abilities, they just needed to motivate themselves a little more. You have to say that the visitors have been the better side. The home side were defending patiently to win the ball off the opponent and launch the counter. However, the away side moved the ball around and were waiting for a gap to appear in the home side's defence.
